post_cleaning.summary: Expect minor gum sensitivity for 24 hours. Avoid staining foods and brush gently.
tips: Rinse with warm salt water twice a day.
Delay coffee or wine for 12 hours.

root_canal.summary: Mild soreness is typical for 48 hours. Continue antibiotics if prescribed.
tips: Take ibuprofen every 6 hours as needed unless contraindicated.
Stick to soft foods on the treated side.
Call us immediately if swelling increases after day 3.

teeth_whitening.summary: Temporary sensitivity to cold drinks can occur for up to 72 hours.
tips: Avoid deeply pigmented foods for 48 hours.
Sip cool water to reduce discomfort.
